text: Foluke Adeboye was born on the 13th of July,1948. She is a wife to Enoch Adeboye. She was a child of the family of Jacob Adelusi Adeyokunnu, Ayeyokunnu was a prince of the kings family of Owa Obokun Oji in Ijeshaland, Osun State, Nigeria. Her father wasof the kings race. He was also a teacher in the Methodist mission and a Christian questioner. She is the oldest of six girls and four boys in the family. Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Osun State
title: Foluke Adeboye
